mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, user_pw userPw, email, user_date userDate FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_date DESC ) M WHERE rownum < = 7*#{memberCount}) WHERE rnum > 7*(#{memberCount}-1)
mapper.update: update users set user_pw=#{userPw}, email=#{email} where user_id=#{userId}
